document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">reticent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">volcano </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">keeps </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">slumbering </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">plan; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Confided </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">projects </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">pink </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">precarious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">man. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">tale </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Jehovah </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">told </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">human </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">proceed </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">listener? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Admonished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">buckled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">lips </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">prater </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">secret </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">neighbors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">keep </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Immortality. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The reticent volcano keeps
